docstring.long_description:
Requires an OPEN SERIAL block at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument.
docstring.short_description: Select the output function for a 33120A function generator.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires a OPEN SERIAL node).

parameters.name: waveform
parameters.description: The type of function to use.

returns.description: String: Summary of waveform generator settings.
